funding-source.institution: Coordination for the Improvement of Higher Education Personnel
Brazilian National Council for Scientific and Technological Development

funding-group.funding-statement: This work was supported by the Coordination for the Improvement of Higher Education Personnel (CAPES, www.capes.gov.br) (grant number 9589-13-9 to CRV) and the Brazilian National Council for Scientific and Technological Development (CNPq, www.cnpq.br) (grant number 482261/2010-2 to CCJ). The Federal Ministry for Economic Cooperation and Development (BMZ) and the German Academic Exchange Services (DAAD) fund the Center for International Health at Medical Center of the University of Munich, Germany, through the Excellence Centers for Exchange and Development (EXCEED). The funders had no role in study design, data collection and analysis, decision to publish, or preparation of the manuscript.
